title: Innovating Science Education Through Activity Theory and Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts in elementary science education and foundational understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: A science education curriculum applying activity theory optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Apply core components of activity theory (subject, tools, community, etc.) to science lesson design
Develop and implement science education activity plans integrating instructional design theory and activity theory
Develop science learning materials using smartphone-based tools in small collaborative environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
